title: ESP
extract: ESP is an abbreviation for 'English for specific purposes' or 'English for special purposes'. [British] 2. uncountable noun. ESP is an abbreviation for 'extra-sensory perception'.
extract_html: ESP is an abbreviation for 'English for specific purposes' or 'English for special purposes'. [British] 2. uncountable noun. ESP is an abbreviation for 'extra-sensory perception'.
